english.segment1: Oh Magnify the Lord with me, let us exalt his name together sing praises, praises unto the King
english.segment2: From The Rising Of The Sun unto the setting of the same, we sing praises, praises unto the king.
english.segment3: If I had ten thousand tongues, I would praise him with every one and sing praises, praises unto the king
english.segment5: Hallelujah, thank you Jesus, we were created to bless your holy name (x2)
english.segment6: Prince of Peace, Mighty God, we were created to, bless your holy name (x2)
english.segment11: Lord I love you, Lord I love you
english.segment17: We were created to bless your holy name (x3)
